name: Horizontal scroll image slideshow
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
This plugin will create the Horizontal scroll image slideshow gallery at side sidebar widget.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/horizontal-scroll-image-slideshow/

  • Live Demo Live Demo
  • More Information More Information
  • User Comments User Comments

Horizontal scroll image slideshow lets you showcase images in a horizontal scroll like fashion, one image at a time and in a continuous manner, with no breaks between the first and last image.

Features of this plugin

  • Simple
  • Easy installation.
  • Widgets, so you can add pretty much anything.
  • Easy slideshow size (width & height) override option.

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.faq:
Q1. Where to upload my image?

Q2. Why my image gallery out of range?

Q3. Why my slideshow not scroll properly or why one image overlaps another at the time of scroll?

Q4. I want to use this plugin in the pages or posts?
